languages.text: {n}Одного удара хватает, чтобы прервать мучительное существование псайкера. Вы оглядываете труп — и вдруг замечаете, что черты лица словно оплавлены от невыносимого жара. Что бы или кто бы ни властвовал над несчастной, теперь он исчез без следа.{/n}

{n}A single blow is enough to end the psyker's pitiful existence. You examine the corpse and, with a start, realise the woman's facial features seem to have melted from extreme heat. Whoever or whatever had the poor creature in its thrall has now vanished without a trace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Одного удара хватает, чтобы прервать мучительное существование псайкера. Вы оглядываете труп — и вдруг замечаете, что черты лица словно оплавлены от невыносимого жара. Что бы или кто бы ни властвовал над несчастной, теперь он исчез без следа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A single blow is enough to end the psyker's pitiful existence. You examine the corpse and with a start realize the woman's facial features seem to have melted from an unbearable heat. Whoever or whatever had power over the poor thing is now gone without a trace.{/n}

{n}A single blow is enough to end the psyker's pitiful existence. You examine the corpse and with a start realize the woman's facial features seem to have melted from an unbearable heat. Whoever or whatever had power over the poor thing is now gone without a trace.{/n}

{n}A single blow is enough to end the psyker's pitiful existence. You examine the corpse and, with a start, realise the woman's facial features seem to have melted from extreme heat. Whoever or whatever had the poor creature in its thrall has now vanished without a trace.{/n}

{n}A single blow is enough to end the psyker's pitiful existence. You examine the corpse and, with a start, realise the woman's facial features seem to have melted from extreme heat. Whoever or whatever had the poor creature in its thrall has now vanished without a trace.{/n}

{n}A single blow is enough to end the psyker's pitiful existence. You examine the corpse and, with a start, realise the woman's facial features seem to have melted from extreme heat. Whoever or whatever had the poor creature in its thrall has now vanished without a trace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你仅仅用了一击，就结束了这个可怜的灵能者的性命。你检查了这个女人的尸体，发现她的面部特征仿佛被高温熔化了一遍。虽然不知道是什么人或是什么东西束缚住了这个可怜女人的灵魂，但那个东西已经消失得无影无踪了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A single blow is enough to end the psyker's pitiful existence. You examine the corpse and, with a start, realise the woman's facial features seem to have melted from extreme heat. Whoever or whatever had the poor creature in its thrall has now vanished without a trace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你仅仅用了一击，就结束了这个可怜的灵能者的性命。你检查了这个女人的尸体，发现她的面部特征仿佛被高温熔化了一遍。虽然不知道是什么人或是什么东西束缚住了这个可怜女人的灵魂，但那个东西已经消失得无影无踪了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un golpe basta para poner fin a la triste existencia de la psíquica. Examinas el cadáver y te sorprende ver que los rasgos faciales de la mujer se han derretido por el calor extremo. Quienquiera que tuviera a esta pobre en su poder ha desaparecido sin dejar rastro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A single blow is enough to end the psyker's pitiful existence. You examine the corpse and, with a start, realise the woman's facial features seem to have melted from extreme heat. Whoever or whatever had the poor creature in its thrall has now vanished without a trace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un golpe basta para poner fin a la triste existencia de la psíquica. Examinas el cadáver y te sorprende ver que los rasgos faciales de la mujer se han derretido por el calor extremo. Quienquiera que tuviera a esta pobre en su poder ha desaparecido sin dejar rastro.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異能者という惨めな生き物の始末には一撃で十分だった。死体を調べると、女の顔のパーツが極度の熱で溶けたようになっていることにハッと気づく。相手が誰であれ何であれ、この哀れな生き物を囚えていたスロールは、証拠を残さず消えてしまったのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A single blow is enough to end the psyker's pitiful existence. You examine the corpse and, with a start, realise the woman's facial features seem to have melted from extreme heat. Whoever or whatever had the poor creature in its thrall has now vanished without a trace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異能者という惨めな生き物の始末には一撃で十分だった。死体を調べると、女の顔のパーツが極度の熱で溶けたようになっていることにハッと気づく。相手が誰であれ何であれ、この哀れな生き物を囚えていたスロールは、証拠を残さず消えてしまったのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein einziger Schlag reicht aus, um die erbarmungswürdige Existenz der Psionikerin zu beenden. Du untersuchst die Leiche und stellst mit Schrecken fest, dass das Gesicht der Frau durch extreme Hitze geschmolzen zu sein scheint. Wer oder was auch immer die arme Kreatur in den Fängen hatte, ist nun spurlos verschwunden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A single blow is enough to end the psyker's pitiful existence. You examine the corpse and, with a start, realise the woman's facial features seem to have melted from extreme heat. Whoever or whatever had the poor creature in its thrall has now vanished without a trace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein einziger Schlag reicht aus, um die erbarmungswürdige Existenz der Psionikerin zu beenden. Du untersuchst die Leiche und stellst mit Schrecken fest, dass das Gesicht der Frau durch extreme Hitze geschmolzen zu sein scheint. Wer oder was auch immer die arme Kreatur in den Fängen hatte, ist nun spurlos verschwunden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un coup suffit à mettre fin à l'existence de la psyker. Alors que vous examinez le cadavre, vous vous rendez compte que la chaleur intense semble avoir fait fondre les traits faciaux de la femme. La chose qui possédait cette pauvre créature a disparu sans laisser de trace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A single blow is enough to end the psyker's pitiful existence. You examine the corpse and, with a start, realise the woman's facial features seem to have melted from extreme heat. Whoever or whatever had the poor creature in its thrall has now vanished without a trace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un coup suffit à mettre fin à l'existence de la psyker. Alors que vous examinez le cadavre, vous vous rendez compte que la chaleur intense semble avoir fait fondre les traits faciaux de la femme. La chose qui possédait cette pauvre créature a disparu sans laisser de trace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ruhsezerin zavallı varlığı, tek darbede sonlanıyor. Cesedini incelerken kadının yüz hatlarının eridiğini fark ediyorsun. Aşırı sıcaktan olduğunu düşünüyorsun. Zavallıcığı esir tutan her kim veya neyse ardında herhangi bir iz bırakmadan kaybolup gidiyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A single blow is enough to end the psyker's pitiful existence. You examine the corpse and, with a start, realise the woman's facial features seem to have melted from extreme heat. Whoever or whatever had the poor creature in its thrall has now vanished without a trace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruhsezerin zavallı varlığı, tek darbede sonlanıyor. Cesedini incelerken kadının yüz hatlarının eridiğini fark ediyorsun. Aşırı sıcaktan olduğunu düşünüyorsun. Zavallı varlığı pençelerinde tutan her kim veya ne ise, ardında herhangi bir iz bırakmadan kaybolmuş gibi…{/n}
